title: Cook County Health Officials Identify 2nd Suburban Measles Case, Possible Exposure At OHare Airport
snippet: The unvaccinated 4-year-old acquired measles from international travel and passed through terminal 5 at O'Hare on Sept. 11.

title: There’s a new outbreak of Ebola in Africa. Here’s what you need to know

title: Is it the magnesium or the massage? The facts about magnesium lotion for sleep
snippet: Social media influencers claim that using lotion with magnesium promotes sleep. But there's little evidence magnesium taken in this way is effective.
